page.title: 05FARM LIFE
page.content: We interviewed one of the farmers in our area and asked him what life was like on a modern farm.He was brought up on a nearby farm(his father still farms locally)so he has always lived and farmed in this area.He gets up at 5am and works a seven day week. He finds it rewarding working with animals and misses the passing of the working animals,but finds he has enough vet. problems as it is.His favourite animals are cows and his least favourite sheep as they are "too much trouble" The biggest change he has encountered is improvement in machinery which has resulted in more efficiency...producing more produce as cheaply as possible.Machinery is very expensive though,e.g.his combine harvester cost Â£70 000.
